page.title: 18Tourism around Harberton
page.content: After farming tourism is the only "industry" in the area. Many farm incomes are supplemented by letting rooms for bed and breakfast, or holiday cottages, or land for camping or caravanning, also there are two small guest houses in the village. Whilst realising the importance of visitors to the economy of the area some resentment exists, because of the overcrowding of the roads, beaches and towns - parking in Totnes in "the season" is practically impossible! Also when homes are for sale in the area, resentment is felt when they are sold for high prices as holiday homes, thus precluding young local couples. By many the visitors or "grockles" are considered a necessary evil!
